程序包 com.geometry.resources.task4

package com.geometry.resources.task4
  • 类
    类
    说明
    AreaByDiameter
    Visual representation for calculating the area of a circle using its diameter This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a circle when the diameter is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
    AreaByDiameter.AreaByDiameterPanel
    Panel for displaying the circle area calculation visualization (using diameter) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its diameter and area formula
    AreaByRadius
    Visual representation for calculating the area of a circle using its radius This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a circle when the radius is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
    AreaByRadius.AreaByRadiusPanel
    Panel for displaying the circle area calculation visualization (using radius) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its radius and area formula
    CByDiameter
    Visual representation for calculating the circumference of a circle using its diameter This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the circumference of a circle when the diameter is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
    CByDiameter.CByDiameterPanel
    Panel for displaying the circle circumference calculation visualization (using diameter) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its diameter and circumference formula
    CByRadius
    Visual representation for calculating the circumference of a circle using its radius This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the circumference of a circle when the radius is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
    CByRadius.CByRadiusPanel
    Panel for displaying the circle circumference calculation visualization (using radius) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its radius and circumference formula
